job_history.work_description: Support CEO and corporate operating committee directly by shaping and implementing AIG's strategy on a global level. Initiate, evaluate and execute M&A deals and innovation investments in order to enable AIG's inorganic growth.
Supported Industrials Coverage Group by building client presentations, evaluating and compiling financial metrics and aiding in model analysis and valuation.

Taught 30 undergraduates stock market fundamentals and socially responsible investing in order to increase financial literacy. Evaluated public companies by analyzing strategy and operations, examining financial statements and performing valuation.

projects.description: Built database of financial metrics including market capitalization, total revenues and assets, segment (property and casualty versus life and retirement) revenues and assets from 70 companies in order to formulate a peer list and competitor set for AIG.
Compiled 8 years of titanium price and production data in order to project summary financials and aid private equity buyer in determining valuation price of the target company.
Invested $1,000 of fundraised money in selected microfinance businesses, B corps, or charities to support social impact.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in financial analysis, including evaluating M&A deals, innovation investments, and building financial models, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Mergers and Acquisitions
skills.explanation: Initiated, evaluated, and executed M&A deals, suggesting strong proficiency in this area.

skills.name: Investment Banking
skills.explanation: Supported Industrials Coverage Group and worked on model analysis and valuation, indicating strong proficiency in investment banking.

skills.name: Financial Modeling
skills.explanation: Built financial models and compiled financial metrics, suggesting strong proficiency in financial modeling.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Compiled and analyzed large datasets, including financial metrics and production data, indicating strong proficiency in data analysis.

skills.name: Valuation
skills.explanation: Performed valuation analysis and aided in determining valuation price of target companies, suggesting strong proficiency in valuation.

skills.name: Database Management
skills.explanation: Built a database of financial metrics, showing a solid working proficiency in database management.

skills.name: Market Research
skills.explanation: Conducted market research and formulated a peer list and competitor set, indicating a solid working proficiency in market research.

skills.name: Social Impact Investing
skills.explanation: Invested in selected microfinance businesses, B corps, or charities, suggesting some practical experience in social impact investing.

skills.name: Financial Literacy
skills.explanation: Taught undergraduates stock market fundamentals and socially responsible investing, indicating some practical experience in financial literacy.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Co-President of a startup, indicating a solid working proficiency in leadership.
